profile_summary: Data engineer with 10 years in healthcare analytics, working on secure and high-integrity data pipelines for clinical decision systems and hospital analytics.

experience.title: Data Engineer, MedStat GmbH; Stuttgart, Germany — 2018–Present
experience.summary: Developed ETL and anonymization pipelines for clinical data. Maintained Redshift-based warehouse with HIPAA-compliant data flows.

experience.title: Analytics Engineer, BioCore AG; Heidelberg, Germany — 2014–2018
experience.summary: Led metrics tracking platform for patient outcomes using Spark and Airflow. Developed patient readmission risk datasets.

experience.title: Data Integration Specialist, HealthMetrics UG; Freiburg, Germany — 2011–2014
experience.summary: Worked on HL7 data ingestion and mapping systems from hospital IT systems to research-grade datasets.
